recipesJson.name: Nay-Ked
recipesJson.author: folkart
recipesJson.description:
Nay-Ked! This is a departure from my normal bakery and cream recipes. Some times you just got to get away from the same-old same-old. I've been wanting a juice to take me to another place,... a secluded island in a distant land. This recipe strips away all the heavy bakeries, creams, and sweeteners to just enjoy a great "tropical fruit" vape on a secluded nude beach somewhere in the Pacific(I wish). It's quite hard to explain but I will try.
Top note: FA Orange and FA Lemon Sicily not to over-powering though
Middle note: CAP Golden Pineapple and CAP Kiwi
End note or bottom note: FA Lemon Sicily and INW Cactus. It has a slight floral note but not so much that it gets in the way of the other flavors. I don't like most floral notes in juices but this sits well with this juice. 
Nice refreshing vape for a change of pace.
5 days steep for best results but can be a shake and vape

Please comment, mix, and or rate,...it make us all better mixers. Enjoy :)

reviews.text: I love how the orange and kiwi play off each other in this.  It's a very bright and sweet juice, which is not usually my thing, but it works here.  Probably the best use of FA Orange I've tasted.  The longer I vape this, the more I enjoy it.
